description:
AudioBible Free is an application that will let you listen to the full unabridged audio of the King James Version of the Bible streamed on-demand to your iPhone or iPod Touch whenever you are in WiFi, 3G, or Edge coverage areas (WiFi only for iPod Touch). The entire contents of the Old and New Testaments are available for you to listen to instantly without taking up any space on your iPhone or iPod Touch.

Audio is streamed from the excellent readings of the KJV Bible available from the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saint's website.


Features:
* Excellent narrators makes listening to the scriptures a pleasure.
* Quick, intuitive interface lets you get to the desired chapter quickly.
* Playback starts within seconds of selecting the desired chapter.
* You can power-off screen during playback to save battery.

This is a fully functional, free version of the AudioBible application.  The paid version of AudioBible adds the following features:
* Plays chapters continuously
* Plays them in the background through Safari allowing you to use most other applications on your device while the audio continues to play.

--Please Note--
*  This application requires internet access.  It will not work if you do not have internet coverage.
*  If you lose internet coverage while you are listening, the audio will stop.  This is not because the audio is anything other than the full King James Version of the Bible, it is simply because your connection failed.

This application is not sponsored nor endorsed by the LDS Church and the LDS Church is the copyright holder of the audio. Audio files are freely downloadable at lds.org if you wish. By purchasing application, you are simply making it quick and easy to listen to the Holy Bible.

Please visit http://www.JasperPhone.com for more information and to submit feature requests.

"Who hath ears to hear, let him hear." Matthew 13:9
